contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 15, 1887 D Newcastle Contest
Newcastle Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Newcastle upon Tyne Contest newcastle-contest
Exhibition Park, Newcastle Contest associated with the Newcastle Jubilee Exhibition.
Prizes: 12 guineas + 12 guinea cornet, 10 guineas + 11 guinea cornet, 8 guineas + 11 guinea baritone, 5 guineas + 7 guinea trombone, 4 guineas
Contest was confined to brass bands belonging to the counties of Northumberland and Durham. Twenty bands competed, the pieces played being mostly from the works. of Meyerbeer, Round, Verdi, Balfe, Weber, Rossini, and Gounod.
[Note â€“ another report on this contest splits the first/second prizes between Annfield Plain Band and Tanfield Lea Band]
Dec. 31, 2011, 11:10 p.m. Nov. 12, 2017, 5:49 p.m.
1 South Derwent George Raine
1 Tanfield Lea Alexander Owen
3 Whitworth & Spennymoor Silver Prize Band George Raine
4 St. Hilda Colliery John Dennison Reminiscences of Verdi
5 West Pelton Volunteers Unknown
